---
title: Make Screen
description: Create a file that serves as the main page or view to be displayed on the client side.
---

## Command
Follow this command to create a new screen.
```plaintext
lukio make:screen
```

## Available
This command is available for:
- Fullstack nextjs
- Frontend nextjs

## Example
```bash
// write in your terminal
lukio make:screen
// ...
enter your screen name: Hello
```

## Output
File will be created in `src/interfaces/screens/hello_screen/main.tsx`
```jsx {1, 2}
/**
 * @author lukio-cli
 * @generated at 2000-01-01 00:00:00
 * This file is generated by lukio CLI
 */

import type React from 'react';
import { Fragment } from 'react';
type HelloProps = Record<string, never>

const HelloScreen: React.FC <HelloProps > = () => {
    return (
        <Fragment>
            <h1>Screen Hello!</h1>
        </Fragment>
    );
};

export default HelloScreen;
```
